trans_welcomeApp: Ласкаво просимо в Organized – твій інструмент, щоб краще організовувати зборові справи
trans_whatIsApp: Чи є Organized є офіційним додатком для Свідків Єгови?
trans_descApp: No, it is not. You are free to choose whether to use it or not. We recommend that its use has been approved by all the congregation elders, Also, we are aware that there are many similar applications currently available to help you to accomplish the same tasks. We are not here to say what is the best and what is not. We believe all of these applications are good and have their own methods on how to do things, but still share the same goal.
trans_appPWA: Organized - PWA додаток. Що це означає?
trans_appPWADesc:
As a PWA, or progressive web application, Organized is an application software functioning in the web. It is intended to work on different operating systems, including both desktop and mobile devices.

You can install Organized on your device, and once the initial setup is complete, it will work even offline while you don't have an internet connection.
trans_appSecure: Наскільки захищені ваші дані, коли ви використовуєте Organized?
trans_appSecureDesc:
We are dedicated to providing you with a secure app to help manage your congregation responsibilities. In the fast-evolving world of web development, we're committed to staying up to date with the latest technologies.

Although Organized is a web app, please be aware that all your Organized data is saved locally on your device. This means you can still use the app even when you are offline. If you decide to share your data with other members in your congregation, then these data will be synced securely with the cloud. For private data, we ensure encryption and secure storage on our servers.
trans_clearBrowserData: Please keep in mind that when you are clearing your browser history or cookies, you are also deleting unsynchronized Organized data. Before doing so, please make sure that your recently created data has been synced.
trans_appPrivacy: Як Organized піклується про вашу конфіденційність?
trans_appPrivacyDesc:
When you accept to use our Organized application, you give us the permission to collect the following informations: your name and email address. We are also collecting your device IP address, your user agent details to identify you when you access our server, ensuring a seamless and convenient app experience.

We do not allow any advertising companies to collect data through our services to target you with any ads. We do not share data collected by Organized application with other organization for any purpose.
trans_readComplete: Я прочитав та погоджуюся з інформацією вище
trans_accountCreated: Твій аккаунт в Organized створено. Повідом адміністратора програми у твоєму зборі, щоб він надав тобі необхідні дозволи, а тоді онови цю сторінку.
trans_unauthorizedRole: You do not have yet the role to use this application. Please contact your congregation elders to confirm your role and after 5 minutes try again. They may send us an email if they need further support.
trans_oauthAccept: By continuing, you are indicating that you accept our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
trans_signInDesc: Виберіть нижче, який сервіс ви хочете використовувати для входу
trans_emailAuthDesc: Введи адресу твоєї електронної пошти, щоб ввійти в Organized з допомогою посилання
trans_emailAuthDescComplete: Ви авторизувались, використовуючи адресу електронної пошти. Тепер ви можете увійти і отримати доступ до програми.
trans_emailAuthSent: Будь ласка, перевір свою електронну пошту. Якщо ти не можеш знайти посилання, будь ласка, перевір папку "спам" або спробуй відправити посилання ще раз
trans_accountSetup: Щоб активувати програму Organized на цьому пристрої, будь ласка, введи знизу код, отриманий від старійшин твого збору.
trans_illustrationMinistryAssignmentsDes: Дивися всі свої майбутні завдання та отримуй сповіщення про нові. Бери нову територію зі списку доступних. Надішліть заяву на допоміжне піонерське в кілька кліків і отримай доступ до функцій для піонерів, такі як трекер часу, детальний місячний та річний звіт.
trans_illustrationMultiPlattformDescript: Використовуй Organized на своєму комп'ютері ноутбуці, смартфоні, планшеті з будь-якою з сучасних операційних систем. Додаток працює онлайн, але також доступний навіть якщо немає інтернет-з'єднання.
trans_illustrationMeetingSchedulesDescri: Import meeting plans from jw.org in just a click and auto-fill assignments. Share your list of outgoing speakers and browse other congregations’ lists to better collaborate. Publish the schedules for publishers and participants to see their assignments.
trans_illustrationSecretaryDescription: Track meeting attendance record for all meetings, both monthly and annually. View publisher reports and easily send all necessary reports directly to your local branch. Receive and review auxiliary pioneer applications.
trans_selectAccount: To start using Organized, choose which option applies to you:
trans_accountPublisherStudent: Publisher or a student of midweek meeting
trans_checkInvitationCode: Please double check the code you provided
trans_congregationCreateLabel: Your congregation does not exist in Organized yet?
trans_incompleteCongregationInfo: Please check that all the required information to create a congregation were provided
trans_encryptionCodeSetupDesc: Create your own encryption code for the congregation.
trans_encryptionCodeLostDesc: Your code has been locally deleted. Enter your own encryption code for the congregation
trans_encryptionCodeNotice: Please note the code and to keep it safe. If you lose it, you will lose all your congregation data.
trans_encryptionCodeInvalid: The encryption code you entered is not correct
trans_emailNotSupported: Sorry, this email is invalid or not supported
